news.Title: [AI Summary] 采鈺本週股價小幅震盪，近期公布資本額變更及董事異動
news.Content: • 采鈺本週股價變動幅度為 1.90%，近期公布限制員工權利新股收回註銷完成實收資本額變更登記事宜 [1]，以及法人代表董事異動 [2]。, • 公司於 11 月份陸續公布訂購廠務工程設施與設備 [3]，並受邀參加機構投資人說明會 [4]。 【綜合分析】 參考來源：Yahoo奇摩股市: 5則 | 資料期間：2025-11-10 至 2025-11-26 | 新聞數量：5 則 采鈺 (6789) 在 2025 年 11 月下旬至 12 月初的股價呈現小幅震盪，最新收盤價為 268.00 元，較前一日下跌 0.74%。回顧過去一週，股價上漲 1.90%，顯示市場反應相對平穩。在此期間，公司發布了多項重要公告，其中最為關鍵的是限制員工權利新股收回註銷完成實收資本額變更登記事宜 [1]。根據公告，本次減資後，公司實收資本額略有調整，流通在外股數亦隨之變動，此舉對公司財務結構的影響需進一步觀察。 此外，采鈺也公告了法人代表董事的異動。台灣積體電路製造股份有限公司改派法人代表董事，原任者李健欣（台積公司特殊技術業務開發處資深處長）卸任，由徐宏仁（台積公司感測器業務開發處副處長）接任，此人事變動已於 11 月 14 日生效 [2]。這顯示出公司在董事會結構上的調整。 在營運方面，采鈺於 11 月 13 日發布了訂購廠務工程設施與設備的公告，交易總金額為新台幣 318 百萬元 [3]，顯示公司持續進行基礎建設投資。同時，公司也積極與投資界互動，受邀參加機構投資人說明會，分別於 11 月 13 日參加 CLST 所舉辦的「Taiwan Market Access Day」，以及 11 月 19 日參加 Macquarie 所舉辦的「Taiwan conference 2025」 [4]，此舉有助於提升公司市場知名度與投資者關係。 回顧 10 月份的合併營收，采鈺公布為 7.39 億元，年減 18.28% [5]，顯示短期營運面臨挑戰。綜合來看，儘管營收數據受到影響，但公司透過資本額調整、董事會人事變動以及持續的基礎設施投資，並積極與市場溝通，預期將對其長期發展產生影響。

news.Title: [AI Summary] VisEra Stock Fluctuates Modestly This Week; Capital Reduction and Director Changes Announced
news.Content: • VisEra's stock price saw a weekly change of 1.90%. Recent announcements include the completion of capital reduction due to the cancellation of restricted employee stock options [1] and changes in its corporate representative director [2]., • In November, the company also announced the procurement of factory engineering facilities and equipment [3] and participation in institutional investor conferences [4]. [Analysis] Sources: Yahoo Finance Taiwan: 5 articles | Period: 2025-11-10 to 2025-11-26 | Number of News: 5 VisEra (6789) experienced modest stock price fluctuations from late November to early December 2025, closing at NT$268.00, a 0.74% decrease from the previous day. Over the past week, the stock rose by 1.90%, indicating a relatively stable market reaction. During this period, the company issued several significant announcements, most notably the completion of its capital reduction following the cancellation of restricted employee stock options [1]. According to the announcement, the company's paid-in capital and outstanding shares were adjusted post-reduction, a move whose impact on the company's financial structure warrants further observation. Furthermore, VisEra announced a change in its corporate representative director. Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) has appointed a new representative director. Li Jian-Xin (Senior Director of Business Development, Special Technology at TSMC) has stepped down, and Hsu Hung-Ren (Deputy Director of Business Development, Sensor Business at TSMC) has taken his place, with the change effective November 14 [2]. This indicates an adjustment in the company's board structure. Operationally, VisEra announced on November 13th the procurement of factory engineering facilities and equipment for a total transaction amount of NT$318 million [3], signifying ongoing investment in infrastructure. Concurrently, the company actively engaged with the investment community, accepting invitations to institutional investor conferences. VisEra participated in CLST's "Taiwan Market Access Day" on November 13th and Macquarie's "Taiwan conference 2025" on November 19th [4], activities that aim to enhance the company's market visibility and investor relations. Reviewing October's consolidated revenue, VisEra reported NT$739 million, a year-on-year decrease of 18.28% [5], suggesting short-term operational challenges. In summary, despite the impact of revenue figures, the company's capital adjustment, board personnel changes, and continuous infrastructure investment, coupled with proactive market communication, are expected to influence its long-term development.
